79312.「こんにちは アクセサリー復元屋のミーネだよ。\n 同じアイテムの破片を まとま:
Welcome. I'm Meene, and this is the Accessory Restoration. If you give me enough accessory shards...I can restore the original accessory.
It'll cost <%dL_ACCE_RST_GOLD> Gold each time I restore something. So, do you...want to try it?
